sentences.en: A blanket keeps us warm because it is woollen and thick.
sentences.cn: 毯子给我们保暖,因为它用羊毛制成而且很厚.

sentences.en: He wore a woollen vest beneath his shirt.
sentences.cn: 他衬衫里面穿着一件羊毛背心.

sentences.en: I slipped off my woollen gloves.
sentences.cn: 我迅速地脱下了毛绒手套。

sentences.en: In the Middle Ages the term "drab" denoted a very simple type of woollen cloth which was used by peasants to make their clothes.
sentences.cn: 中世纪时，drab（“本色布”）一词指的是一种农民用来制衣的非常普通的羊毛织物。

sentences.en: In winter we wear woollen clothes to keep us warm.
sentences.cn: 冬天我们穿毛料衣服以保暖.

sentences.en: It does serve the purpose to put on another woollen sweater.
She bought a pair of woollen hose yesterday.
sentences.cn: 昨天她买了一双毛线袜子.

sentences.en: She stood there in the old coat and woollen cap, her face smudged with dirt.
sentences.cn: 她站在那里，身穿旧外套，头戴羊皮帽，脸上脏兮兮的。

sentences.en: She threw a heavy woollen cloak over her shoulders.
sentences.cn: 她把一件厚重的羊毛斗篷披在肩上.

sentences.en: She was demurely dressed in a black woollen suit.
sentences.cn: 她穿了一身黑色羊毛套装，显得很庄重。

sentences.en: They left off their woollen underwear when the weather got warm.
sentences.cn: 天气转暖的时候,他们不再穿羊毛内衣.

sentences.en: Will this soap shrink woollen clothes?
sentences.cn: 这种肥皂会使毛织衣物收缩 吗 ?

sentences.en: Woollen cloth and timber were sent to Egypt in exchange for linen or papyrus.
sentences.cn: 羊毛料和木材送到埃及以换取亚麻布或纸莎草纸.

sentences.en: Woollen fabrics shrink in the wash.

words.tran_cn: 羊毛的；模糊的；似羊毛的
羊毛；毛线；绒线；毛织品；毛料衣物
羊毛工（把羊毛分类的人）
